00075 enum l4_ipc_tcr_error_t
00076 {
00077   L4_IPC_ERROR_MASK       = 0x1F, 
00078   L4_IPC_SND_ERR_MASK     = 0x01, 
00080   L4_IPC_ENOT_EXISTENT    = 0x04, 
00083   L4_IPC_RETIMEOUT        = 0x03, 
00086   L4_IPC_SETIMEOUT        = 0x02, 
00089   L4_IPC_RECANCELED       = 0x07, 
00092   L4_IPC_SECANCELED       = 0x06, 
00095   L4_IPC_REMAPFAILED      = 0x11, 
00099   L4_IPC_SEMAPFAILED      = 0x10, 
00102   L4_IPC_RESNDPFTO        = 0x0b, 
00106   L4_IPC_SESNDPFTO        = 0x0a, 
00110   L4_IPC_RERCVPFTO        = 0x0d, 
00114   L4_IPC_SERCVPFTO        = 0x0c, 
00118   L4_IPC_REABORTED        = 0x0f, 
00121   L4_IPC_SEABORTED        = 0x0e, 
00124   L4_IPC_REMSGCUT         = 0x09, 
00128   L4_IPC_SEMSGCUT         = 0x08, 
00132 };

00420 L4_INLINE int

00425 /************************************************************************
00426  * Implementations
00427  **********************/
00428 
00429 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00430 l4_ipc_error(l4_msgtag_t tag, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00431 {
00432   if (!l4_msgtag_has_error(tag))
00433     return 0;
00434   return l4_utcb_tcr_u(utcb)->error & L4_IPC_ERROR_MASK;
00435 }
00436 
00437 L4_INLINE long
00438 l4_error_u(l4_msgtag_t tag, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00439 {
00440   if (l4_msgtag_has_error(tag))
00441     return -(L4_EIPC_LO + (l4_utcb_tcr_u(u)->error & L4_IPC_ERROR_MASK));
00442 
00443   return l4_msgtag_label(tag);
00444 }
00445 
00446 L4_INLINE long
00447 l4_error(l4_msgtag_t tag) L4_NOTHROW
00448 {
00449   return l4_error_u(tag, l4_utcb());
00450 }
00451 
00452 
00453 L4_INLINE int l4_ipc_is_snd_error(l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00454 { return !(l4_utcb_tcr_u(u)->error & 1) == 0; }
00455 
00456 L4_INLINE int l4_ipc_is_rcv_error(l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00457 { return l4_utcb_tcr_u(u)->error & 1; }
00458 
00459 L4_INLINE int l4_ipc_error_code(l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00460 { return l4_utcb_tcr_u(u)->error & L4_IPC_ERROR_MASK; }
00461 
00462 
00463 /*
00464  * \internal
00465  * \ingroup l4_ipc_api
00466  */
00467 L4_INLINE int
00468 l4_sndfpage_add_u(l4_fpage_t const snd_fpage, unsigned long snd_base,
00469                   l4_msgtag_t *tag, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00470 {
00471   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00472   int i = l4_msgtag_words(*tag) + 2 * l4_msgtag_items(*tag);
00473 
00474   if (i >= L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE - 1)
00475     return -L4_ENOMEM;
00476 
00477   v->mr[i]     = snd_base | L4_ITEM_MAP | L4_ITEM_CONT;
00478   v->mr[i + 1] = snd_fpage.raw;
00479 
00480   *tag = l4_msgtag(l4_msgtag_label(*tag), l4_msgtag_words(*tag),
00481                    l4_msgtag_items(*tag) + 1, l4_msgtag_flags(*tag));
00482   return 0;
00483 }
00484 
00485 L4_INLINE int
00486 l4_sndfpage_add(l4_fpage_t const snd_fpage, unsigned long snd_base,
00487                 l4_msgtag_t *tag) L4_NOTHROW
00488 {
00489   return l4_sndfpage_add_u(snd_fpage, snd_base, tag, l4_utcb());
00490 }
